name: Toggle (itch) (reddave)
description:
Toggle

Use strategy to pass through Toggle blocks

How to play:
  • You are the white dot
  • Click on any neighbouring square (there are faint markers) to move
  • Every move, the red blocks will toggle on and off
  • When the red block is off, you can go through them
  • When you are in a red block, the block won't toggle
  • Get to the yellow goal to win
Stuck?

If you are confused, or you beat a level without knowing what you did, here are some tips:

  1. Moving in a triangle pattern allows you to "waste a move". This is good to pass through toggle blocks.
  2. You can only pass through a row of blocks if they are alternating. If they are not alternating, you can "de-sync" the blocks by stepping on and off one of the blocks.
